Title: Expands the definition of mental health care provider for purposes of certain sex offenses committed during a treatment session, consultation, interview, or examination
Summary: Expands the definition of mental health care provider to include behavior analysts, mental health practitioners and other mental health professionals for purposes of certain sex offenses committed during a treatment session, consultation, interview, or examination.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to expanding the definition of mental health care provider for purposes of certain sex offenses
